formula: a(n)=b(2*n+1) ahere b(n)=sum(k=1..n, binomial(n,k)*(((-1)^(k-1)+1)*(sum(i=0..k, (k-2*i)^(n-k)*binomial(k,i)))*sum(j=1..k, j!*2^(k-j-1)*(-1)^((k+1)/2+j)* stirling2(k,j)))/(2^k)); [From _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 21 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=b(2*n+1);b(n):=sum(binomial(n,k)*(((-1)^(k-1)+1)*(sum((k-2*i)^(n-k)*binomial(k,i),i,0,k))*sum(j!*2^(k-j-1)*(-1)^((k+1)/2+j)*stirling2(k,j),j,1,k))/(2^k),k,1,n); [From _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 21 2011](PARI)a(n)={n=2*n+1;sum(k=1,n, binomial(n,k)*(((-1)^(k-1)+1)*(sum(i=0,k, (k-2*i)^(n-k)*binomial(k,i)))*sum(j=1,k, j!*2^(k-j-1)*(-1)^((k+1)/2+j)* stirling(k,j,2)))/(2^k));} /* Kruchinin's formula; _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 22 2011 */
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended and signs tested Mar 15 1997 by __Olivier GÃ©rard__.
